name: One Pixel (drewpit)
description:
This game was created for the 2019 GMTK game jam with the theme "Just One". I call it "One Pixel".

It's designed to be played on a page with a white background.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move left and right. You may need to click the game first to get keyboard inputs to register.

Source code: https://github.com/apitman/One-Pixel-Game
